sentences.en: ...the wreck of a sailing ship.
sentences.cn: …一艘帆船的残骸。

sentences.en: A one-mile area around the wreck is still off limits.
sentences.cn: 沉船方圆一英里内仍然禁止进入。

sentences.en: A wreck on shore is a beacon at sea.
sentences.cn: 前车之覆,后车之鉴.

sentences.en: Burning sulfur from the wreck has forced evacuations from the area.
sentences.cn: 残骸上燃烧着的硫黄迫使人们撤出该地区。

sentences.en: Divers discovered the wreck of an old German warship.
sentences.cn: 潜水员发现了一艘沉没的德国旧军舰。

sentences.en: He was still alive when they pulled him from the wreck.
sentences.cn: 他们把他从失事的车辆中拖出来时，他还活着。

sentences.en: I was a gibbering wreck by this stage.
sentences.cn: 我到这时候说话已颠三倒四，神经高度紧张。

sentences.en: Injury threatened to wreck his sporting career.
sentences.cn: 伤病可能会毁了他的运动生涯。

sentences.en: It was drink that wrecked their marriage.
sentences.cn: 是酒毁了他们的婚姻。

sentences.en: It was embarrassing and sad to see this man reduced to a mumbling wreck.
sentences.cn: 看见这个人变得口齿不清、弱不禁风，真是让人既难堪又悲哀。

sentences.en: The car was a total wreck.
sentences.cn: 这辆车完全报废了。

sentences.en: The car was a worthless wreck after the collision.
sentences.cn: 撞车以后,那辆车成了毫无价值的残骸.

sentences.en: The car was completely wrecked in the accident.
sentences.cn: 汽车在事故中完全损毁。

sentences.en: The plane is destroyed, a complete wreck: the pilot must have died on impact.
sentences.cn: 飞机遭到毁坏，完全成了一堆残骸：飞行员肯定死于撞击。

sentences.en: The precise location of the wreck was discovered in 1988.
sentences.cn: 残骸的确切位置是在1988年发现的。

sentences.en: The wreck of the crashed plane was distributed over a wide area.
sentences.cn: 坠毁的飞机碎片散落在一片土地上.

sentences.en: This sighting occurred during my dive to a sunken wreck off Sardinia.
sentences.cn: 这是我在撒丁岛附近的沉船残骸处潜水时所见的景象。

sentences.en: Two passengers are still trapped in the wreck.
sentences.cn: 有两名乘客仍被困在失事的车辆里。

sentences.en: We thought of buying the house as a wreck, doing it up, then selling it.
sentences.cn: 我们想过把这栋房子当作废弃建筑买下来，修缮一下，然后再卖掉。

sentences.en: What would he tell his parents if he had a wreck?
sentences.cn: 如果他出了事故，他怎么向他的父母交代？

sentences.en: You look a wreck.
sentences.cn: 你看起来身体很糟糕。

trans.tran_cn: 失事的船（或汽车等），车祸，精疲力竭的人，身体健康受损的人

trans.tran_en: to completely spoil something so that it cannot continue in a successful way
to completely spoil something so that it cannot continue in a successful way
